channel.title: Benefits on Calling Dibs in Slack
channel.description: Recent content in Benefits on Calling Dibs in Slack

item.title: Benefit 1
item.description: Ditch the spreadsheets. Let your team reserve shared resources and leave the coordination to us.

item.title: Benefit 2
item.description: Teams work in Slack. Allow your team to reserve shared resources without the lengthy Slack threads.

item.title: Sign Up Today
item.description: We’re launching early access to our software. Try it out for free below.
